Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful weekend”

Reviews.Content: partner stayed 3 nights 25 march 2011 booked hotel air miles lived expectations flight landed 5 pm decided train barcelona getting taxi train cost 6 euro 15 cents 30 mins passeig de gracia hotel couple minutes walk reception staff friendly helpful soon checked hired safe box cost 5 euro night dont bad floor double single bed overlooking main road noise nice clean maid service daily missing tea coffee facilities usually included hotel breakfasts buffet style cereals yoghurts cold meats plenty pastries staff breakfast friendly hotel placed sightseeing couple minutes walk casa batllo 10 minute stroll plaza de catalunya sight seeing buses strolled ramblas port worth visit sight seeing bus bought 2 day ticket worth money 30 euro opposed 23 euro day ticket nou camp stadium cable car harbour fab 10 euro 1 journey park guell brilliant liked port vell marina managed stroll beach shirt weather lovely tapas restaurants minutes hotel fab time definately return barcelona hotel aero bus airport slightly expensive train couple euros 15 minutes pick bus plaza de catalunya run 10 mins
